name: Fragrant Brown Rice
keywords: brown rice, ginger, mushroom, side dish

recipeInstructions.text: To cook brown rice in a 30-minute meal it must be soaked for 2 hours. Cover rice with water and allow to soak. To cook, bring rice with water to boil. Reduce heat to simmer; cover and cook rice about 20 minutes, or until tender and water has evaporated.
Slice onions and put garlic through press. Saute in hot oil until onions are soft, about 5 minutes.
Wash and slice mushrooms; mince ginger. Add to onions with raisins and spices. Continue sauteing until mushrooms are soft.
Stir vegetables into rice with cashews. Add vegetable broth; stir to mix well and heat broth. Serve.
